Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Marcus Morris?

Marcus Morris is 36 years old.

Where was Marcus Morris born?

Marcus Morris was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

When was Marcus Morris born?

Marcus Morris was born on September 2, 1989.

How tall is Marcus Morris?

Marcus Morris is 6-8 (203 cm) tall.

How much does Marcus Morris weigh?

Marcus Morris weighs 218 lbs (98 kg).

Is Marcus Morris in the Hall of Fame?

Marcus Morris is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Marcus Morris drafted?

Marcus Morris was drafted by Houston Rockets, 1st round (14th pick, 14th overall), 2011 NBA Draft.

What position does Marcus Morris play?

Power Forward and Small Forward.

What is Marcus Morris' net worth?

Marcus Morris has made at least $108,027,184 playing professional basketball.

How much does Marcus Morris make?

Marcus Morris made $17,116,279 in 2024.

How many rings does Marcus Morris have?

Marcus Morris has won 0 championships.

What is Marcus Morris' Instagram account?

Marcus Morris is on Instagram at foestar13.

What schools did Marcus Morris attend?

Marcus Morris attended Prep Charter in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, APEX Academy in Pennsauken, New Jersey and Kansas.

What are Marcus Morris' nicknames?

Mook is a nickname for Marcus Morris.
